name: All Aboard! (itch)
description:
Five suspects. So, who dunnit? A murder mystery set on a train - how original. The twist here is that none of the passengers or staff recognise the victim.  To make matters worse you seem to be stuck in some sort of time phonomenon.  Explore the train, talk to the other passengers and staff, and try and unravel the mystery before you have to start over again. by friendshaped

Music:
